UPM / Japan collaboration
Introduction
10
Ontology-based data access technology applied to Bio2RDF
§
Unified view and common access 
to a set of data sources based on 
ontologies and mappings
§
The relationships between the 
knowledge graph and the source 
data are stablished with mappings
§
It creates a Virtual Knowledge 
Graph, a virtual RDF view of the 
data
Ontology-Based Data Access (OBDA)
